title: The iDOLM@STER: Cinderella Girls - New Generations
original_name: The iDOLM@STER シンデレラガールズ ニュージェネレーションズ
sinopse:
The acceptance letter they received from the idol office was in error!? Will these 3 Cinderellas be able to clear the challenges given to them and climb the path toward becoming idols?

(Source: Translated from the Gangan Online Website)
